content: अभिसंधिः {@--1@} Speech; deliberate declaration, promise. {@--2@} Intention, object, purpose, aim; तस्या अभिसंधिना विधेयीकृतोपि <ls>Māl. 1</ls>; <ls>Dk. 38</ls>; स्वर्ग° <ls>Ku. 6. 47.</ls> {@--3@} Implied sense, the meaning intended, as in अयमभिसंधिः (frequently occurring in explanatory glosses). {@--4@} Opinion, belief. {@--5@} Special agreement, terms of an agreement, condition, stipulation; अथावश्यमेव माधवसेनः पूज्येन मोचयितव्यः श्रूयतामभिसंधिः <ls>M. 1.</ls> {@--6@} Deception. {@--7@} Making peace or alliance. {@--8@} Junction, combination.
